name: Pistolenwalzer
description:
Pistolenwalzer is a game where you play as a groom who, in the middle of his wedding ceremony, has had his bride kidnapped by Satan himself. He hands you a pistol and tasks you with slaughtering his seeming endless waves of demons, threatening his brides life if he refuses to do so. 

Pistolenwalzer combines elements of Crypt of the Necrodancer with an art style inspired by ZeroRanger, and the theming of european ballroom dance, featuring an OST by Daniel Mirfin.
